reviews.productTitle: Lutron Caseta Smart Lamp Dimmer 3-Way Kit and Pico Remote, for Floor and Table Lamps, for Dimmable LED Lights, 100 Watt, Single-Pole/3-Way, P-PKG1P-WH
reviews.text: I wish Lutron made something not so expensive for this but it works well. Used it to control the end table lamps in my TV room with a Pico on a stand on the coffee table. I put the device into non-dimming mode since the Ikea lamps have custom non-dimming bulbs and used a simple on/off Pico. You have to find the Lutron “advanced instructions” online to learn how to do that. So I’m wasting the dimmer capability, hence wishing Lutron had a cheaper device. But still, this is a useful device
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2025
reviews.title: The right solution for a Lutron household

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Caseta Smart Lamp Dimmer 3-Way Kit and Pico Remote, for Floor and Table Lamps, for Dimmable LED Lights, 100 Watt, Single-Pole/3-Way, P-PKG1P-WH
reviews.text: Lutron switches and dimmers are the best. Very reliable. I love that they work with the Lutron hub for wireless control over WiFi. I hooked this up to some LED garage shop lights to turn them on and off. I also have one for the lamp next to my bed which has a 200W LED bulb that I can dim and turn off and on with my phone or the Lutron remote while I’m in bed. I use Lutron dimmer switches throughout my home. Started using them in my original 3-story townhome so I wouldn’t have to run up and down stairs to turn off lights that I’d forgotten to turn off before going to bed! Saved my knees. I also use Lutron’s geo fencing to automatically turn off lights when I leave home and to turn them on when I return.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2025
reviews.title: Works great.
variationList: Style: Lamp Dimmer and Remote Kit

reviews.text: This is a high quality lamp remote! We have installed them on all of our lamps not that we have young children in the house. Allows me to quickly and easily set the appropriate light level for feeding or sleeping. I recommend this as a gift for expectant parents as it is so nice to have the the nursery lamp on a dimmer. This item feels like it is quality, not cheap junk that is going to start an electrical fire and burn your house down. I also recommend go ahead and get the remote stand.

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Caseta Smart Lamp Dimmer 3-Way Kit and Pico Remote, for Floor and Table Lamps, for Dimmable LED Lights, 100 Watt, Single-Pole/3-Way, P-PKG1P-WH
reviews.text: I have long raves about these wall switches and wall outlets. They more than pay themselves in new construction or remodeling by not needing to have three-way switches installed. The Pico remotes can be programmed to control multiple devices. And multiple Picos can control a single device. That said, when the wall outlets are powered off, they still leak a tiny bit of electricity. This is not a problem for major brands like Phillips, which get warmer as you dim them, but for several foyers I have 1W dimmable LEDs which provide perfect illumination in these areas. I installed these wall outlets and thought these small round LED bulbs were from the same manufacture but they are not. One bulb turns off completely. The other stays on like a tiny nightlife. I swapped them out both plug in outlets leak a bit of power to this particle bulb. As there is no flickering, I like this unintended nightlight function, and the rest of these outlets I previously ordered turn the larger wattage of Philips LEDs completely off, thus much of the issue is that this one brand of 1W LED bulb is hypersensitive to the tiny leak of current that still flows when the plug-in outlet is turned off. Again, I highly recommend this product and only experienced this issue from all these dozen plus outlets in two homes with one brand of a 1W LED.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2024
reviews.title: Must Haves - But Careful with Bulbs
variationList: Style: Lamp Dimmer and Remote Kit

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Caseta Smart Lamp Dimmer 3-Way Kit and Pico Remote, for Floor and Table Lamps, for Dimmable LED Lights, 100 Watt, Single-Pole/3-Way, P-PKG1P-WH
reviews.text: I think Lutron products are great. I have Caseta Products throughout my home. This, however, was a failure at first, until I tried many bulbs to find one that would dim less than 50% brightness. I purchased this to replace my manual dimmer switch and to have HomeKit control. This just does not operate as good as the actual wall switches, but it gets the job done. What I had to use is a Feit 100w vintage LED bulb which lets me dim pretty much down to a 5% brightness level. Any other dimmable LED bulb with a lower wattage just didn’t work right or flickered.

We also have the controls/hub pointing to a designated 2.4 Ghz Internet of Things (IoT) SSID we setup on our NetGear WiFi router. Lutron does it right. Period.

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Caseta Smart Lamp Dimmer 3-Way Kit and Pico Remote, for Floor and Table Lamps, for Dimmable LED Lights, 100 Watt, Single-Pole/3-Way, P-PKG1P-WH
reviews.text: These are great. I spent years buying less expensive smart switches and plugs...but finally took my own professional advice, spent the money and switched to Lutron's Casseta system throughout the house. I have a pico switch at our front door with "All lights on" and "All lights off" function. I know Lutron makes the best control products available from my line of work, but now I really understand - it is super user friendly and fast to install and program. There are a few bugs that I'm working out but, the best consumer-grade system by far. Now that everything is dimmed and controlled, I can concentrate on the lighting design of my house without software distraction. Works great with Google home so far.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2024
reviews.title: From an Expert Lighting Designer

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Caseta Smart Lamp Dimmer 3-Way Kit and Pico Remote, for Floor and Table Lamps, for Dimmable LED Lights, 100 Watt, Single-Pole/3-Way, P-PKG1P-WH
reviews.text: The Lutron Caseta Single-Pole/3-Way Smart Lighting Lamp Dimmer and Remote Kit has become an essential part of my smart home lighting setup. This kit offers a hassle-free and efficient way to control the lighting of my lamps, creating a cozy and comfortable ambiance in any room. Setting up the smart lamp dimmer was a breeze. The kit includes clear instructions, and I was able to install the dimmer in just a few minutes without any special tools. The compatibility with various bulb types is impressive. Whether I'm using dimmable LED, incandescent, or halogen bulbs, the Lutron Caseta Smart Lamp Dimmer provides smooth and flicker-free dimming performance. The included Pico remote control is a game-changer. It allows me to control the lamp's brightness from anywhere in the room, eliminating the need to get up and manually adjust the dimmer. The remote's sleek and ergonomic design makes it comfortable to hold. The smart lamp dimmer integrates seamlessly with my existing smart home ecosystem. I can use voice commands through Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant to adjust the lamp's brightness, creating a hands-free lighting experience. The "smart away" feature is a thoughtful addition. It automatically turns the lamp on and off randomly when I'm away from home, giving the impression that someone is present and enhancing security. The lamp dimmer's ability to create customizable schedules is fantastic. I can set specific brightness levels for different times of the day, ensuring the perfect lighting atmosphere for every moment. The smart lamp dimmer is a single-pole/3-way switch, providing flexibility for different wiring configurations and allowing control from multiple locations. The Lutron app is user-friendly and intuitive, allowing me to control the lamp dimmer and other Lutron devices with ease from my smartphone. In conclusion, the Lutron Caseta Single-Pole/3-Way Smart Lighting Lamp Dimmer and Remote Kit is a fantastic addition to any smart home. Its easy installation, seamless integration, and versatile control options make it a top-notch smart lighting solution. If you want to elevate your lamp lighting experience and enjoy the convenience of remote control and voice commands, I highly recommend this kit. Embrace the comfort and flexibility it brings to your lighting setup and take full control over the ambiance of your home with the Lutron Caseta Smart Lamp Dimmer and Remote Kit.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.title: Great Lamp Lighting Dimmer
variationList: Style: Lamp Dimmer and Remote Kit

reviews.text: Mechanical timers for lamps are no match. The Lutron unit allows for precise on/off multiple times each day. The level of intensity can also be preset. Each day can have its own unique schedule. With the included remote switch you can easily override the presets. This unit overcomes the limitations of mechanical timers that need to be changed after power interruptions. There is no mechanical "wheel" that can be "played" with by children or adjusted by well meaning visitors.

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Caseta Smart Lamp Dimmer 3-Way Kit and Pico Remote, for Floor and Table Lamps, for Dimmable LED Lights, 100 Watt, Single-Pole/3-Way, P-PKG1P-WH
reviews.text: The Lutron Casada switches are excellent. The integration was their app and Alexa works perfect. We have been very happy using it in our home. Because of the price we are slowly transitioning one room at a time. We also have the bridge and the coverage seems to be very good. Because we have a larger piece of property we split our Internet into two networks so that we could put a separate bridge out in the barn to control those lights and have one in the house. I think that is a huge benefit of the Lutron app being able to have it operate in two different locations on two different networks names. I forgot to mention you can only need to use one app and you can switch between the two. It takes a while to get through to customer service but they are extremely helpful when you talk to them.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2022
reviews.title: Great product
variationList: Style: Lamp Dimmer and Remote Kit

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Caseta Smart Lamp Dimmer 3-Way Kit and Pico Remote, for Floor and Table Lamps, for Dimmable LED Lights, 100 Watt, Single-Pole/3-Way, P-PKG1P-WH
reviews.text: I'm pleased with how easy it was to connect it to my wi-fi. I'm pleased with how accurate and consistent it's. The Pico switch allows me to have control of lamps from my bed. I use one Pico switch to control two lamp in my room. I have the controller turn lights on and off and presets times. You need to read the instructions they are easy follow (for me anyway). I'm pleased with the product.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2022
reviews.title: I'm pleased

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Caseta Smart Lamp Dimmer 3-Way Kit and Pico Remote, for Floor and Table Lamps, for Dimmable LED Lights, 100 Watt, Single-Pole/3-Way, P-PKG1P-WH
reviews.text: As a retired electronics engineer I appreciate the technology that went into these simple home automation devices. They look good, and work well, BUT, they have one fatal flaw. They do not seem to have any protection against short circuits! A fast tripping breaker, even a fast blow fuse would be a simple thing to add. While passing out Halloween candy to kids, one of their costumes tipped over an incandescent walkway light, and caused the two poles of the filament to touch. POP goes the $50 Lutron switch, taken out by a shorted $0.50 bulb! Adding short circuit protection would cost very little to Lutron, and would make this product bulletproof. Consider doing that Lutron, as I spend another $50 for a replacement. The replacement will connect to AC through a fast acting surge protector. That might save me another $50 should something like this happen again. BUT, better to fix the cause than address the symptom, right, Lutron.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2022
reviews.title: No Short Circuit Protection
variationList: Style: Lamp Dimmer and Remote Kit

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Caseta Smart Lamp Dimmer 3-Way Kit and Pico Remote, for Floor and Table Lamps, for Dimmable LED Lights, 100 Watt, Single-Pole/3-Way, P-PKG1P-WH
reviews.text: I started using Lutron back in 2015. The application is perfect for organizing and programming the switches to work with each other in a multitude of ways. The ability to add switches wherever I need without adding wires is fantastic. Also there is a sensor you can buy that automatically turn lights on and off, you can also have the light auto turn on at any level of light. Handy for late night trip to the restroom. Now in 2022 the world has changed from indecent lightbulbs to LED lights. Unfortunately Lutron has not updated their hardware to work with LEDs making them not only useless but annoying as LEDs burnout much sooner than they should, blink insensibly, or will not turn off at all (just blinks). Contacting Lutron they act like that is not true - they have a list of lights that work - a list? First sign of a company that has stopped updating their hardware. Do not buy. Modernizing your lights with smart switches is very expensive and needs to work with todays LEDs. With Lutron you are investing in obsolete hardware. Regards, I’m a 40 year research and development engineer from a national laboratory - retired
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2022
reviews.title: Does not work with most LED lights - very disappointing
variationList: Style: Lamp Dimmer and Remote Kit

reviews.text: The functionality of this plug was just what I wanted. The loud electrical whine that lamps emitted when plugged into it was not. I tried multiple lamps and multiple wall outlets before deciding that I just can't live with that level of disruption to the quiet.

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Caseta Smart Lamp Dimmer 3-Way Kit and Pico Remote, for Floor and Table Lamps, for Dimmable LED Lights, 100 Watt, Single-Pole/3-Way, P-PKG1P-WH
reviews.text: We have most of our lights on remotes, and all of our light switches have dimmers, but this was the first remote we found that included a dimmer. It was easy to pair the remote to the light and we LOVE the favorite setting button in the center of the remote. When you turn off the light there is a small delay to give you time to exit before it goes dark. The Lutron Caseta plug in lamp remote worked so well we bought another. Highly recommend it.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2022
reviews.title: Easy to setup and love a remote with a dimmer!
variationList: Style: Lamp Dimmer and Remote Kit

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Caseta Smart Lamp Dimmer 3-Way Kit and Pico Remote, for Floor and Table Lamps, for Dimmable LED Lights, 100 Watt, Single-Pole/3-Way, P-PKG1P-WH
reviews.text: I installed two wall sconces on either side of a TV in my master bedroom, so being able to control the brightness of both lights is critical for functionality of the lights in the room, and this remote made it all possible. I use the remote everyday to turn the lights on either at full brightness for the whole room or the designated dimmer light ideal for watching TV. Programming the dimmer level was super easy, and now I just have to press the middle button for it to turn on at that saved level. This remote is absolutely wonderful, and I could not recommend it enough for controlling lights plugged into an outlet.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2022
reviews.title: Use this everyday
